displaytitle: Study of a Doctor of Theology
creditline: Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943
inscribed:
in graphite, upper center: Peter House Cambridge
in graphite, upper left: Doctor of Theology
in graphite, center: [various color notes]
in graphite and ink, left lower half: at Pembroke. Ridley bad [underlined] ||  Ruffs tie before | in ecclesiastics 
in graphite and ink, right lower half: some beard & hair | square cap & Black without shirt | collar || all ruffs small & narrow | until a few years on | in Eliz ths, Reign--& the | wrist ruffes small. & | band of fur or black | velvet two or 3 inches | broad on the lawn sleeve.

titles.title: Album containing 99 original drawings and 87 architecture, portrait, and costume studies of a documentary nature for the paintings Latimer Preaching at Paul's Cross and The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer.
Study of a Doctor of Theology

makers.displaymaker: Sir George Hayter, 1792–1871; born and died London, England
